message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
Thanks for showing me this product, Alice. I'm interested, but $110 is a bit too high for my budget. Would you consider $90?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $110 might be a bit steep for you. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $105. It's a fair price, considering the value this product brings. What do you think?
I appreciate you coming down on the price, Alice.  I'm trying to keep it closer to $95, would that work for you?

I understand you're trying to get closer to your target price, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $100. It's the minimum I'm willing to accept for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, though. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $102.50. It's a fair compromise, considering the value this product brings. What do you think?
